casebody.data:
IN RE: SOUTHEASTERN EYE CENTER 358A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Douglas S. Harris, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Douglas S. Scott F. Wyatt, Attorney at Law, High Point, Donavan J. Hylarides, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Richard A., et al. James Mark McDaniel, Jr., for McDaniel, James Mark (Jr.). Byron L. Saintsing, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Nivison Family Investments, LLC, et al. Robert E. Fields, III, Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, for Jeutter, Jr. reciever for CCSEA/SCLC/SEM/HUTA/EMS/KEPES/DRE.

Eric H. Biesecker, Attorney at Law, Greensboro.

Connie E. Carrigan, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Old Battleground Properties, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of November 2016 by Plaintiffs to Dismiss Appeals:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
